description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Design and develop new streaming solutions for video surveillance.
              
              •	Design the architecture and infrastructure for large scale streaming solutions
              
              •	Support the team as technical expert for video streaming
              
              •	Investigate and suggest new technologies for video content analysis
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Deep knowledge in video encoding / compression (H.264, H.265…) and video formats
              
              •	Substantial experience in video processing, transmission, network design, QoS
              
              •	Experience with setup and configuration of media servers (e.g. Wowza, Evostream…)
              
              •	Good programming skills in at least one of these languages: Java, C++, Go
              
              •	Highly desirable: experience with GPU decoding / Cuda
              
              •	Highly welcome: experience with Docker / Kubernetes
              
              •	Good command of written and reading English, specially document and work relation
              

              What we offer:
              
              •	13th month salary & flexible working hours (up to 2 hours)
              
              •	Premium health insurance
              
              •	15 days annual leave; 03 days sick leave
              
              •	Birthday gift; Company trip
              
              •	English training course
              
              •	Kindergarten support
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
